review.title: “Eh...”
review.pros: Pros – - Friendly environment (for most part)- Overall decent coworkers- Acceptable benefits
review.cons: Cons – - A LOT of travelling- Dealing with non-friendly locals in cities other than Tehran which can be extremely annoying- Extremely moody management team- The nature of tasks/missions can get completely irrelevant to telecommunication.
review.advice-to-management: No, I would not recommend this company to a friend
